title: The Vineyard
itunes:title: The Vineyard
description: In this striking parable of the vineyard, Jesus lays out both God's vision for the world as well as his plan of redemption. The Lord wants us to be fully and dynamically alive, and to assure that this happens, he gives us his only Son as a redeemer. In the course of my homily this week, I try to "decode" this wonderful story.

In the course of my homily this week, I try to "decode" this wonderful story.
